project_descr: The Nias Islands Transition Project: Enhanced Nias district capacity to successfully complete the recovery process

donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
outputs.output_descr: - relevant BRR systems to coordinate and implement the reconstruction projects are integrated into local and provincial governments; - assets built under BRR's mandate accepted and sustainably managed by the designated organization.

donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
outputs.output_descr: - Institutional arrangements and an enabling environment facilitate participatory implementation of DRR measures established; - Gender-sensitive community-based disaster risk reduction activities implemented in selected sub-districts; - Public awareness raised on risks of potential disasters and its   mitigation and preparedness measures.

donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
outputs.output_descr: - Provincial government agencies (Sekda, Bappeda, Badan PP and KB, Inspectorate and Bapedalda) coordinate and monitor post-BRR rehabilitation and reconstruction activities; - District government agencies coordinate, plan and implement post-BRR rehabilitation and reconstruction activities (Bappeda, Badan PP and KB, Finance Agency, Kimpraswil); - Civil society integrated into recovery and ongoing government activities; - Economic development of Nias enhanced through use of national policies and resources for disadvantaged and commercial linkages.

In order to provide management support, UNDP will achieve these missions: 
- Project Management Unit and consultants and recruited; - Procure required good and services; - Conduct regular financial report; - Conduct monitoring and reporting system; - Preparation and dissemination of lessons learned reports on outputs
